name: DGCP MaMeeFarm — Proof 446
description:
This proof documents real-world agricultural labor at MaMeeFarm.

The image records the gradual planting of spring onions in a vegetable plot inside an empty duck shelter.
The work is not completed in a single session but carried out consistently over time, alongside multiple daily responsibilities.

At the time of this record, the task is expected to result in a fully planted plot by the end of the day.
This proof reflects sustained, incremental labor rather than one-time execution.

Captured at 07:47 AM (local time) on January 6, 2026, this activity represents continuous agricultural work under real-world constraints.
